pkgmetadata.longdescription: Retrieve Data from MacLeish Field Station // Download data from the Ada and Archibald MacLeish Field Station in Whately, MA. The Ada and Archibald MacLeish Field Station is a 260-acre patchwork of forest and farmland located in West Whately, MA that provides opportunities for faculty and students to pursue environmental research, outdoor education, and low-impact recreation (see http://www.smith.edu/ceeds/macleish.php for more information). This package contains weather data over several years, and spatial data on various man-made and natural structures.
